description: Leading development of customer-facing web applications serving 100K+ users. Architected microservices infrastructure that improved system performance by 40%. Mentored 3 junior developers and established code review standards that reduced bugs by 25%.

Developed and maintained e-commerce platforms handling $2M+ in monthly transactions. Implemented real-time features using WebSocket and improved mobile performance by 60%. Collaborated with design team to create responsive, accessible user interfaces.

Built responsive web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks. Collaborated closely with UX designers to implement pixel-perfect designs. Optimized application bundle size by 30% and improved Core Web Vitals scores.

position: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
description: Comprehensive computer science education with focus on algorithms, data structures, and software engineering. Completed senior capstone project building a distributed system for real-time data processing. GPA: 3.7/4.0
Demonstrated expertise in developing and maintaining applications on the AWS platform. Proficient in AWS services including EC2, S3, Lambda, DynamoDB, and CloudFormation.

Active contributor to various open source projects including React ecosystem libraries and Node.js tools. Maintained a personal library with 1K+ GitHub stars. Participated in Hacktoberfest for 3 consecutive years.
